languages.text: "Направь мою руку, чтобы верный удар настиг еретиков, покусившихся на эти палаты... ни один злодей не уйдет от возмездия Бога-Императора, что несут наши длани!"
"Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"
languages.original_text: "Направь мою руку, чтобы верный удар настиг еретиков, покусившихся на эти палаты... ни один злодей не уйдет от возмездия Бога-Императора, что несут наши длани!"

traits.locale_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “愿神皇指引我，让我准确击中那些侵占了这座殿堂的异端分子……愿所有邪恶之人都在我的手中品尝到神皇的怒火！”
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: “愿神皇指引我，让我准确击中那些侵占了这座殿堂的异端分子……愿所有邪恶之人都在我的手中品尝到神皇的怒火！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Guía mis golpes contra los herejes que han invadido estos salones... ¡Que ni un solo villano escape de la retribución del Dios Emperador, infligida por nuestra mano!».
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: «Guía mis golpes contra los herejes que han invadido estos salones... ¡Que ni un solo villano escape de la retribución del Dios Emperador, infligida por nuestra mano!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「このホールへと侵入した異端者どもへ向かって、我が一撃を正しく導け…我らの手による神帝陛下の報復から、悪をひとり残さず逃がすな！」
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: 「このホールへと侵入した異端者どもへ向かって、我が一撃を正しく導け…我らの手による神帝陛下の報復から、悪をひとり残さず逃がすな！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Führe meine Hiebe mit sicherer Hand gegen die Ketzer, die diese Hallen missbraucht haben ... Auf dass kein Schurke der Vergeltung des Gottimperators durch unsere Hand entkommen möge!"
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Führe meine Hiebe mit sicherer Hand gegen die Ketzer, die diese Hallen missbraucht haben ... Auf dass kein Schurke der Vergeltung des Gottimperators durch unsere Hand entkommen möge!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Guidez mon bras armé pour punir les hérétiques qui sévissent dans ces murs... Qu'aucun infidèle n'échappe au châtiment de l'Empereur-Dieu ! »
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: « Guidez mon bras armé pour punir les hérétiques qui sévissent dans ces murs... Qu'aucun infidèle n'échappe au châtiment de l'Empereur-Dieu ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ey Tanrı-İmparator! Bu mekâna dadanan kâfirlere savurduğum darbeleri isabetli kıl! Senin adına verdiğimiz cezadan kaçmalarına müsaade etme!"
languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu salonlara sokulan kâfirlere savurduğum darbelere yol göster... Tanrı İmparator'un ilahi cezasını kendi ellerimizle teslim etmemizi sağla, bu cezadan hiçbir kötülüğün kaçmasına müsaade etme!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Guide my strikes true against the heretics who have encroached upon these halls... Let not one villain escape the God-Emperor's retribution delivered by our hands!"
